sn14.25:2.1: Panatipata pativirata panatipata pativiratehi saddhim samsandanti samenti;
sn14.25:2.2: adinnadana pativirata adinnadana pativiratehi saddhim samsandanti samenti;
sn14.25:2.3: kamesumicchacara pativirata kamesumicchacara pativiratehi saddhim samsandanti samenti;
sn14.25:2.4: musavada pativirata musavada pativiratehi saddhim samsandanti samenti;
sn14.25:2.5: suramerayamajjappamadatthana pativirata suramerayamajjappamadatthana pativiratehi saddhim samsandanti samentiâ€ti.
